sentences.en: And they carried the ark of the God of Israel about thither.
sentences.cn: 于是将以色列神的约柜运到那里去.

sentences.en: But some like me think that they found the Ark of the Covenant.
sentences.cn: 但有些人跟我一样认为是找到了方舟.

sentences.en: Deerslayer made the best dispositions he could to keep the ark as nearly stationary as possible.
sentences.cn: 杀鹿人尽量把平底船的位置保持不动.

sentences.en: Half an hour passed, during which time the ark had been slowly stealing over the water.
sentences.cn: 半小时过去了, 这时船在湖面上无声无息地缓缓滑行.

sentences.en: It cost about 65 cents a month to subscribe to the Pine Bluff , Ark ., Commercial.
sentences.cn: 他每月花约6角5分订阅阿肯色州 恩布拉夫 出版的《商业》报.

sentences.en: It is necessary to inspect the opening size of bathroom ark's hinges.
sentences.cn: 有必要检查浴室柜合页的开启度.

sentences.en: My home is warm and cozy, just like Noah's ark.
sentences.cn: 我的家温暖舒适, 简直像挪亚方舟.

sentences.en: Noah raised the ark's huge roof, and daylight streamed in.
sentences.cn: 诺亚升起方舟巨大的船顶, 阳光涌进来.

sentences.en: Obed - Edom and Jehiah were also to be doorkeepers for the ark.
sentences.cn: 俄别以东和耶希亚也是约柜前守门的.

sentences.en: TEN : Remember, the Ark was built by amateurs; the Titanic by professionals.
sentences.cn: 记住, 方舟是叫一群外行人建造的, 而泰坦尼克号是专家的杰作.

sentences.en: The canoe was seized, and immediately secured again to the side of the ark.
sentences.cn: 小舟被人钩住了, 立即被重新系在平底船一边.

sentences.en: The family came over in the ark.
sentences.cn: 这一姓氏可以上溯到方舟时代.

sentences.en: Then put in the ark the Testimony, which I will give you.
sentences.cn: 16必将我所要赐给你的法版放在柜里.

sentences.en: We are the only survivors, just like Noah's Ark?
sentences.cn: 我们是唯一的幸存者就像诺曼方舟一样 吗 ?

sentences.en: Well, all I can find is the Ark Angel.
sentences.cn: 好的, 我所能找到只有“方舟天使”号.

trans.tran_cn: [圣]方舟，[圣]约柜，<美>平底船，避难所
trans.tran_en: in the Bible, the large boat built by Noah to save his family and the animals from a flood that covered the earth
